about.tagline1: A complete product system to care for your beauty
about.missionBody: To deliver professional-grade skincare solutions that transform skin health, providing visible results through scientifically-backed formulas and personalized care routines.

bottom.copy: Explore our scientifically-formulated skincare range, each category designed to target specific skin concerns and deliver visible results.

cleansers.alt: Gentle cleansers for all skin types including foam and gel cleansers

serums.alt: Advanced treatment serums with active ingredients for targeted skin concerns

moisturizers.alt: Hydrating moisturizers for day and night skincare routines

productShowcase.description: Discover our complete skincare collection, scientifically formulated to address all your skin concerns

skinResults.title: See
skinResults.description: See real before and after results from our customers who trusted ELIXIR skincare products. These transformations speak for themselves - visible results that build confidence.

pureIngredients.title: Pure Ingredients
pureIngredients.description: Natural, scientifically-proven ingredients that nourish and protect your skin effectively.

dermatologistApproved.title: Dermatologist Approved
dermatologistApproved.description: All products are tested and recommended by skincare professionals for safety and results.

healthySkinGoals.title: Healthy Skin Goals
healthySkinGoals.description: We help you achieve clear, healthy, and radiant skin through consistent daily care.

fastResults.title: Fast Results
fastResults.description: Experience visible skin improvements within days of starting your skincare routine.

cta.title: Ready for Healthier Skin?

home.title: ELIXIR | Skincare & Beauty Products
home.description: Premium skincare and beauty products for all skin types.

ourStoryPage.heroSubtitle: A journey of passion, science, and dedication to transforming skincare
ourStoryPage.chapter1Paragraph1: In 2020, our founder discovered the transformative power of combining natural ingredients with modern science. Frustrated by products filled with harsh chemicals and empty promises, she embarked on a mission to create something different.
ourStoryPage.chapter1Paragraph2: What started in a small laboratory with a handful of formulations has grown into a movement. A movement that believes skincare should be effective, sustainable, and accessible to everyone who dreams of healthy, radiant skin.

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon | ELIXIR
comingSoon.description: We're launching soon! Stay tuned for our premium beauty products.
comingSoon.heading: We're Coming Soon
comingSoon.subtitle: Something beautiful is on the way. Get ready to discover your natural beauty with our premium cosmetics collection.
comingSoon.emailSuccess: Thank you! We'll notify you when we launch.
comingSoon.footer: We're crafting something special for you. Stay tuned!
